specific_question: What was our average time-to-hire for new engineering positions in Q1 2025?
answer: Average time-to-hire for engineering positions was 45 days, with 80% hired within 60 days.
justification: Time-to-hire metrics for engineers do not address after-sales support or customer trust
dr_question: How can Elexion Automotive increase customer trust through after-sales support while balancing the need for exceptional customer care with efficient and cost-effective service?
